Row.Text: [COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]...it...looks like we couldn't avert that terrible fate of ours. This is terrible...[NEWLINE][COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Don't worry, Oriko...since we'll both die together, we'll still be together. And nothing will ever be able to keep us apart again.[NEWLINE]Now, you bastard, finish us off! What're ya, scared?! Do it!!

[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Ah, you've finally arrived. I've been expecting you for a while. My name is Oriko Mikuni, and she is Kirika Kure, my trusted companion.[NEWLINE][COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Cross us and you'll fuckin' regret it.[NEWLINE][COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Kirika! Mind your manners! I apologize, she is a bit...protective of me. While there is no need for me to doubt what sort of relationship we will have, as I can see it clearly from here, I will still extend courtesy and say that I hope our two nations will get along peacefully.[NEWLINE]
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] I already know you’re going to offer us something better, so let’s not play games, shall we?
[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] You’re starting to piss me off with this garbage you’re trying to foist on us.
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Your attempts to haggle with us when the outcome is already known to me is quite amusing.
[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Hey, Oriko, looks like someone dropped some trash at your door. Want me to take it out for you?
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] I foresee only failure and death for those serving in your army. What do you hope to achieve with such an inconsequential military force?
[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Bring that army any closer to Oriko and you’ll have my claws to deal with.

[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] You looking for a fight, huh?! [NEWLINE][COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Your future is filled with destruction, it seems. State your business and leave quickly, your presence is intolerable.
[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] It’s like you’re asking to be filleted, coming in here after saying those things about Oriko.
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] You’re brazen, denouncing Kirika and I like that. As expected, however - your brutish nature was quite evident to me.

[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Hey, you came at a good time. Oriko just made her first successful sponge cake! [NEWLINE] [COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Kirika! Really...But, yes, come in and have a seat. What did you want to discuss?
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Ah, hello there, it’s good to see you. I have some tea that just finished brewing, why don’t you sit down and have a cup with us?

[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Ah, hello my friend. Right on time, as expected. [NEWLINE][COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Hard to be late when Oriko knows exactly when you’re coming around. [NEWLINE][COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Yes, well, foresight does have its advantages.

[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] I foresaw this, and still...I couldn’t stop it...Why? [NEWLINE][COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Don’t give up, Oriko! We’re not finished yet!

[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Amazing...Even with my Prescience Magic, I can’t stop you... [NEWLINE][COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Who the hell do you think you are?! Nobody should be this strong...
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] This war has raged on long enough. Surely we can come to an agreement?
[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] All right, all right, I get it! I’ll stop fighting if you will.

[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] If you think we’re backing down, you’ve got another thing coming, you tr- [NEWLINE][COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Kirika, please! We need to stand down for now.
[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] What the hell are you doing here? If it’s a one on one duel, you got it!

[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] You’re lucky I foresaw you coming without weapons, or else Kirika would have killed you by now. [NEWLINE][COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Yeah, I’m watching you. One wrong move and you’ll get claws where you don’t want them to be.

[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] You sure do have a deathwish, don’t you? [NEWLINE][COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Really, coming here in the middle of a war. Even with my foresight, I still find myself surprised.
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Ah, you’re back, right on time.
[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Overstaying your welcome a bit, ain’t you?
[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] You’re starting to piss me off, you know that? Get out of here already!
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] You’re not welcome here, and yet you keep intruding.
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] ... [NEWLINE][COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] ...
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Anything else?
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] What would you like to discuss?
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Ah, welcome. Let’s begin our discussion.
[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Hey, what’cha want?
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Greetings. Since I know why you’re here already, let’s get started, shall we?
[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Hey, look what the dog dragged in. [NEWLINE][COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Kirika! Be nice to our guests!
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Hello there. [NEWLINE][COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Hey.
[COLOR:184:189:192:255]Oriko:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Your presence here was an unfortunate black mark on my sight. Speak quickly, and begone.
[COLOR:110:0:0:255]Kirika:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Hey, look, it’s some garbage, straight out of the bin. What do you want?
